overview: Eric B. (EB) manages strategic alliances, focused on partnerships that maximize the content quality of the Panels Network and distribution of the panels end user technology, including technology and database partners, publisher web sites and advertising networks. EB has experience in business and corporate development along with product marketing and management from fifteen years as founding employee or co-founder of several successful technology and entertainment start-ups, including Extensis Corporation, CreativePro.com, Casinopoly, You Software and Attensa. EB received his BA in Communication Arts & Sciences from the University of Southern California.
